description.value:
You gain one of the following powers of your choice. This new power replaces the daily attack power you gained at 15th level.

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-powers.Q3Ph6u7CqUJYdWva]{Ordained Victory}@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-powers.zXB4HCZgQKNVSa27]{Visage of the Gods}

Published in Heroes of the Fallen Lands, page(s) 80.
